lines.text: Hell no. I changed it. My real name is Philadelphia.
Well, how come Detroit gets to break in a cherry?
Oh, well now, Belle, you know cherries don't mix with vinegar.
Let's take it slow, alright? Yeah. Sex is not a race.
So Davy, you're about to make a discovery. It's the reason why men fight for it, and they steal for it, commit their lives for it and even kill for it.
What exactly does The Rising Sun do?
I haven't the slightest idea. It's one of Mr. Bartell's projects who's unfortunately unreachable at the moment. Something to do with the government of China.
No matter what he says remember, 99 percent is bullshit. The other 1 percent is cowshit.
How long you guys been out of puberty?
My, Dolly, with your looks shouldn't you be working the rooms?

[Chuckles]
Oh, you know me, Cary. I'll work my back off but I won't work on my back.
Somehow I... I don't think this is all quite legal.
Oh Stanley, according to the law it never was legal.

Why is it when there something goes wrong management has to blame everybody else? Change the employees. Change the décor. Change! Change! Change! Did it ever occur to you that the problem maybe with management itself?
